В меню ресторана в Тайланде есть 6-килограммовый бургер. Того, кто его съест, ждет денежный приз — видео
Ресторан в Бангкоке обрел популярность, включив в меню 6-килограммовый бургер. Те, кто смогут разделаться с ним за девять минут, получат денежное вознаграждение — примерно $330, сообщает Reuters.

02 Nov 2019, 05:45

«В нашем бургере на самом деле свыше шести килограммов. Это самый большой бургер в стране. Здесь кило-восемьсот хлеба, четыре килограмма говядины или свинины, килограмм бекона. И это без учета овощей и прочего», — отмечает владелец ресторана Chris Steaks & Burgers Комдеч Конгсуан.



Среди всего прочего: луковые кольца в кляре, сыр, кетчуп, майонез и гора картофеля-фри. Все вместе — свыше 10 тысяч калорий, что примерно в пять-шесть раз больше дневной нормы взрослого человека.
Для Youtube-блогеров подобное соревнование оказалось настоящей находкой. Теперь в ресторан практически ежедневно заходят посетители, решившие бросить вызов гигантскому блюду.
Владелец ресторана говорит, что не призывает всех своих посетителей соревноваться в поедании бургера. По его словам, можно просто наслаждаться вкусом. Шестикилограммовый сандвич с говядиной обойдется чуть больше $80, со свининой — около $115.

What is the punishment for false publication?

02 Nov 2019, 05:00

It is considered a crime under the False Disclosure Act and has been taken into consideration by lawmakers in order to protect their reputation.
One of the crimes we may witness more than once in the election season is false propaganda, according to Fars. It is criminal and contrary to the ethics of the election, which is also punishable by the legislator.
Therefore, at the beginning of the election season, we must give legal warnings to both the candidates and their supporters, lest they commit acts to gain more power that smoke goes into the public eye. So, by the end of the election, we will talk about the electoral must-have.
The legislator therefore states in Article 698 of the fifth book of the Islamic Penal Code:
Any person for the purpose of harming or disturbing public or official opinion by letter or complaint or petition or petition or report or distribution of any printed or written or signed or untrue signature or with the same intent contrary to the truth or Or, as a quotation to a natural or legal person or official, expressly or implicitly, whether or not otherwise through the aforesaid material or moral injury, in addition to restoring his dignity, if possible, shall Sentenced to two months to two years or lashing to seventy four.
1. False propagation means to attribute something false to another. In other words, contrary to the act of defamation which entailed the crime of a documentary act (deduction a), in the case of false publication, false statements or acts of attribution must be contrary to the truth and the crime is not required.
For example, a candidate may accuse his competitors of lying or doing a deceptive act.
2. To commit a false propaganda crime, one does not need to attribute several falsehoods to another, but even with the attribution of a false one, the false propagation crime will be realized.
3. If the attribution of the material is correct, the realization of the crime of false propaganda is excluded.
4. Anyone who has been or is a victim of this crime under the law can be any person, whether natural or legal person. Also attributing false material to the authorities is subject to the article. For example, if a candidate in the election season attributes a false statement to a candidate who is also responsible for destroying his or her competitors, it would be punishable under this provision.
5. The attributable of falsehood and the contrary of truth shall be punishable by this Article when the public wrongdoing in deliberate or intentional misconduct or attribution of the unlawful act to a natural or legal person or official or any other official means the same as intent to harm. To have or to disturb the public mind.
